faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Every answer you need for elevated property management
faq.intro: Discover how our mountain concierge delivers bespoke care and five-star standards. Each answer clarifies our premium approach so you can entrust your residence with absolute confidence.

items.question: What is a luxury concierge service?
items.answer: A luxury concierge delivers bespoke assistance for high-end property and stay management. We coordinate every service—welcome, housekeeping, linen, transfers, maintenance, estate care—to create a seamless, effortless experience for every guest.

items.question: What types of properties do you manage?
items.answer: We oversee prestigious chalets, apartments, and villas located in alpine resorts and exclusive residential areas, with unwavering standards of quality, privacy, and comfort.

items.question: Do you provide an on-site welcome service?
items.answer: Yes. Every arrival is tailored: warm greeting, property tour, key handover, and constant availability for any request throughout the stay.

items.question: Can you arrange transfers from stations or airports?
items.answer: Yes, we arrange chauffeured vehicles, private shuttles, or even helicopter transfers depending on your comfort and timing preferences.

items.question: Do you handle check-in and check-out?
items.answer: Yes, we supervise key handover, inventory walkthroughs, luggage assistance, and technical checks so departure is as smooth as arrival.

items.question: Do you take care of housekeeping and linen?
items.answer: Yes, we partner with professional cleaning companies and premium laundries providing hotel-grade linen, towels, and robes. Services follow para-hotel standards and can be scheduled between stays or on demand.

items.question: Do you offer private chef or catering services?
items.answer: Yes. We collaborate with trusted chefs and caterers to craft bespoke dining experiences—breakfast, gastronomic dinners, or private soirées—according to your tastes and dietary preferences.

items.question: Can you prepare the property before arrival?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our pre-arrival service covers grocery shopping, linen setup, fire preparation, temperature settings, and even curated playlists if requested.

items.question: Is your concierge service available 24/7?
items.answer: Yes, for Premium clients. We provide on-demand concierge support, available seven days a week, around the clock, for urgent or unexpected needs.

items.question: How do you select your service providers?
items.answer: We vet every partner for professionalism, reliability, and discretion. Each supplier—housekeeping, laundry, drivers, chefs, electricians, plumbers, spa experts—is audited to guarantee hotel-level standards and a refined alpine luxury spirit.

items.question: Can you take over full property management?
items.answer: Yes. We offer comprehensive management mandates covering marketing, guest coordination, maintenance, and administrative follow-up so owners enjoy transparent, end-to-end oversight.

items.question: Do you handle technical emergencies?
items.answer: Yes. Our team manages preventive maintenance and responds rapidly to breakdowns, water damage, or any incident requiring urgent intervention.

items.question: What are your operating hours?
items.answer: Our teams are typically on site from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. We can set up on-call duty or night coverage for Premium owners.

items.question: Can I book services à la carte?
items.answer: Yes. Every service—housekeeping, linen, welcome, estate management, transport, private chef, or technical maintenance—can be ordered individually with no annual commitment.

items.question: Do you offer year-round property care?
items.answer: Yes. We provide ongoing estate management: inspections, airing, regular cleaning, meter readings, project supervision, and garden upkeep so your residence remains immaculate even when unoccupied.

items.question: How does billing work for your services?
items.answer:
Our billing model is fully transparent:

• Concierge and coordination services are invoiced by our management company.
• Operational services (housekeeping, laundry, electrical, plumbing, etc.) are invoiced directly by partner providers.

This structure ensures perfect traceability, regulatory compliance, and fair compensation, while keeping a single point of contact for you.

items.question: Can I work with you even if I do not rent my property?
items.answer: Yes. We offer year-round estate care for resident and non-resident owners to guarantee security and continuous maintenance.

items.question: Do you manage listings on rental platforms?
items.answer: Yes, we can manage listings and stay logistics on major platforms (Airbnb, Booking, Vrbo, etc.) while preserving your luxury positioning and brand consistency.

items.question: Which areas do you cover?
items.answer: We primarily serve Chamonix, Megève, Combloux, Saint-Gervais, Les Houches, and Passy, and we review bespoke requests for other alpine destinations or exclusive estates.

items.question: How can I request a tailored quote?
items.answer: Contact us via the form or by phone. After an initial discussion, we send a detailed proposal within 24 hours, aligned with your needs and property profile.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Chalet Manager is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data in accordance with GDPR.

data.title: Data Collected
data.content: We only collect data that you voluntarily provide to us via the contact form: name, email, phone (optional), and message.

purpose.title: Processing Purpose
purpose.content: Your data is used exclusively to respond to your contact request and provide you with information about our services.

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.content: Your data is kept for a maximum of 3 years, unless you request deletion.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, and object to the processing of your data. To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@chalet-manager.fr
